name: Friendship (itch) (Rafa_la_Garrafa)
description:
Last year I wanted to make something for the 31 Days of Apex. Sadly, I can't draw a thing to save my life xD But I enjoy making games a lot, so I wanted to make a little game based on a fanart by @_nanasheep I saw last year under the "Trust" prompt that showed two enemy players getting along by the sacred art of teabagging xD So I thougt on making a game based on that idea of teabagging to befriend. 

This is the link to the art that inspired me

Last year I didn't finish it, but this year I really wanted to make something so I decided to mix a prompt of this year with the game idea and came up with this.

Originally this was going to be under the prompt  "Journey" cuase I was planning on adding every legend and multiple levels, but as time went by I realized that I needed to make something smaller so I could be able to finish it before the month ended, so I decided to use Mirage and Path since Path loves Mirage <3.

I know is very lacking on environmental art, level and game design; I struggle to come up with mechanics or ideas, but I enjoy programming and making mechanics and tools and enjoyed to make this thing a lot, I hope that you like it <3
